lines.text: There was a big red hooding ride who sat on a muffet and said, "Oh grandma, what big feet you got" So he chopped off his head with a giant beanstalk and they lived happy ever after. Come on, you gotta go to bed now.

[saying their prayers]
Bless Olive Oyl, and Swee'Pea, and Wimpy, and Bluto, AND POPEYE! And all the people who come to see our pictures.
